demo_page.subtitle: Test the power of our AI on your own images. Our engine instantly detects risks and falls.
demo_page.step1_desc: Import an image of a real situation.
demo_page.step2_desc: The AI identifies skeletons and postures.
demo_page.step3_desc: Receive an alert and immediate advice.
demo_page.note_desc: This demo uses fixed images. For 24/7 real-time protection with continuous video feed, contact us for a Pro installation.
